# Vulnerable Python Dependencies for Testing
# These packages have known security vulnerabilities and should be detected
# by SCA tools like Trivy, pip-audit, OWASP Dependency-Check

# VULNERABILITY 1: Flask with known XSS vulnerability
Flask==2.0.1  # CVE-2023-30861: Potential XSS vulnerability

# VULNERABILITY 2: Requests with SSL verification issues  
requests==2.25.1  # CVE-2023-32681: Proxy-Authorization header leak

# VULNERABILITY 3: PyYAML with unsafe loading
PyYAML==5.3.1  # CVE-2020-14343: Incomplete fix for arbitrary code execution

# VULNERABILITY 4: Jinja2 with template injection
Jinja2==2.11.3  # CVE-2020-28493: ReDOS vulnerability

# VULNERABILITY 5: Werkzeug with debug mode issues
Werkzeug==2.0.1  # CVE-2022-29361: Header injection vulnerability

# VULNERABILITY 6: urllib3 with various issues
urllib3==1.26.5  # CVE-2021-33503: Catastrophic backtracking in URL parsing

# VULNERABILITY 7: Cryptography with weak algorithms
cryptography==3.2  # CVE-2020-36242: Buffer overflow vulnerability

# VULNERABILITY 8: Pillow with image processing vulnerabilities  
Pillow==8.0.0  # CVE-2021-25287: Out-of-bounds read vulnerability

# VULNERABILITY 9: lxml with XML external entity issues
lxml==4.6.2  # CVE-2021-28957: HTML Cleaner allows crafted script content

# VULNERABILITY 10: SQLAlchemy with SQL injection potential
SQLAlchemy==1.3.20  # CVE-2019-7164: SQL injection when receiving a malicious URI

# VULNERABILITY 11: Django with multiple issues (even though not used)
Django==3.1.1  # CVE-2021-33203: Potential directory traversal

# VULNERABILITY 12: NumPy with buffer overflow
numpy==1.19.2  # CVE-2021-33430: Buffer overflow in PyArray_NewFromDescr_int

# VULNERABILITY 13: Pandas with code execution potential
pandas==1.1.3  # CVE-2020-13091: Arbitrary code execution

# VULNERABILITY 14: Scrapy with information disclosure
Scrapy==2.4.0  # CVE-2020-36489: Information disclosure

# VULNERABILITY 15: Paramiko with authentication bypass
paramiko==2.7.1  # CVE-2022-24302: Race condition in auth handler

# Additional vulnerable packages for comprehensive testing
setuptools==49.0.0  # CVE-2022-40897: Regular Expression Denial of Service
pip==20.2.4  # CVE-2021-3572: Arbitrary code execution
